rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {0085, 0124, 0125, 1013, 1204, 1208, 2241, 3255, 3288, 3879, 4527, 4609, 4637, 4638, 4646} Do true Otherwise Any co-req unit set {CHEMENG01, CHEMENG02, ENG-CHEM, ENG-ENV, ENVIRENG01}

description: This unit will introduce students to the fundamentals of material and energy balances through a systematic treatment of:  single and multiple unit operations, reactive and non-reactive processes, recycle and by-pass, extent of reactions, equations of state, vapour-liquid phase equilibrium, solid-liquid phase equilibrium, internal energy and enthalpy changes for process fluids undergoing specified changes in temperature, pressure, phase, reactions and chemical compositions and computer aided simulation of process flow diagrams. A process simulation software will be used to aid in the solution of more complex systems.
